Name: Samsung Galaxy S24 Ultra
Description: Premium flagship smartphone with 200MP camera, S Pen support, and 6.8-inch Dynamic AMOLED display. Features powerful Snapdragon processor and all-day battery life.

Name: Samsung Galaxy A54
Description: Mid-range smartphone with excellent camera performance, vibrant Super AMOLED display, and reliable performance for everyday use.

Name: iPhone 15 Pro Max
Description: Apple's flagship iPhone with titanium design, A17 Pro chip, and advanced Pro camera system. Features USB-C and Action Button.

Name: iPhone 15
Description: The latest iPhone with Dynamic Island, advanced dual-camera system, and USB-C connectivity. Available in beautiful colors.

Name: Dell XPS 13
Description: Ultra-portable laptop with stunning InfinityEdge display, premium build quality, and excellent performance for productivity and creativity.

Name: Dell Inspiron 15
Description: Reliable everyday laptop with solid performance, comfortable keyboard, and good value for money. Perfect for students and professionals.

Name: HP Spectre x360
Description: Premium 2-in-1 convertible laptop with stunning design, long battery life, and versatile performance for work and entertainment.

Name: HP Pavilion 15
Description: Affordable laptop with good performance, modern design, and reliable features for everyday computing needs.

Name: Nike Air Max 270
Description: Iconic lifestyle sneakers with Max Air cushioning, breathable mesh upper, and comfortable fit for all-day wear.

Name: Nike Air Force 1
Description: Classic basketball-inspired sneakers with timeless design, durable construction, and legendary Air cushioning.

Name: Adidas Ultraboost 22
Description: High-performance running shoes with responsive Boost midsole, Primeknit upper, and Continental rubber outsole.

Name: Adidas Stan Smith
Description: Iconic tennis-inspired sneakers with clean design, premium leather upper, and timeless appeal for casual wear.

Name: Zara Wool Blend Coat
Description: Elegant wool blend coat with modern tailoring, premium fabric, and versatile styling for professional and casual occasions.

Name: Zara Cotton T-Shirt
Description: Premium cotton t-shirt with comfortable fit, quality construction, and contemporary design. Available in various colors.

Name: H&M Denim Jacket
Description: Classic denim jacket with modern fit, quality construction, and versatile styling for layering and casual wear.

Name: H&M Cotton Hoodie
Description: Comfortable cotton hoodie with soft fabric, relaxed fit, and casual styling perfect for everyday wear.

Name: The Art of Programming
Description: Comprehensive guide to software development covering algorithms, data structures, and best practices for modern programming.

Name: Digital Marketing Handbook
Description: Complete guide to digital marketing strategies, social media marketing, SEO, and online business growth techniques.

Name: Wireless Bluetooth Headphones
Description: Premium wireless headphones with active noise cancellation, long battery life, and superior sound quality.

Name: Smartphone Stand
Description: Adjustable aluminum smartphone stand with stable base, multiple viewing angles, and compatibility with all phone sizes.
